member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.ICredentialsProvider
member.summary: This interface is used by authentication failure handling in the Team Foundation objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client.ICredentialsProvider.GetCredentials(System.Uri,System.Net.ICredentials)
member.summary: Returns the to use when authenticating with the server.
member.param: The credentials that failed to authenticate. May be null, default credentials which return an empty string for user names, a object, or a object. CredUIPromptForCredentialshttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57594 functions can use the failed credentials to populate the user name box in the dialog box.
The Uri of the server.

member.summary: This method is called by the Team Foundationobjects if the credentials supplied by were successfully authenticated by the server.
member.param: The Uri of the server.
